QuestData.Title: The Last Witch Doctor of Krag'wa
QuestData.Description:
I am Krag'wa, the once mighty. Curse the blood trolls and their dark god! They have slain my worshippers until only Zentimo remained, and now even he is gone.
I want revenge on the blood trolls, but first I must honor the last of my witch doctors. As I have no others, I must request you perform the ritual.
Then we can talk of revenge.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Scepter of Rebirth and use it to perform the Rite of Krag'wa Ritual upon Zentimo.
